newsitem.title: BOLIVIA: SOCCER-RONALDO SIGNS FOR INTERNAZIONALE -- AGENT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-RONALDO SIGNS FOR INTERNAZIONALE -- AGENT.

text.p: Brazilian striker Ronaldo signed a five-year contract with Italian club Internazionale Friday, agent Alexandre Martins and the club's technical director Luis Suarez said.
"Today we signed a contract with Ronaldo. He will present himself to the club on July 1 for a medical and then he will go on holiday," Martins said.
Martins said the financial details of the deal would be announced by the club in Italy.
Ronaldo said at the team's hotel: "I am very happy. This is a problem that has been affecting the national team and now it is out of the way."
